sentences.en: Her speech was greeted with howls of derision.
sentences.cn: 她的演讲受到阵阵嘲笑。

sentences.en: The artist exploring the new is liable to derision and hostility.
sentences.cn: 探索新事物的艺术家容易受到嘲笑和敌意。

sentences.en: A wild burst of laughter followed, partly of derision and partly of delight in the excellence of the joke.
sentences.cn: 接着是一阵狂笑，一半是嘲笑，一半是为这个绝妙的笑话而高兴。
